1.「航海に出られるのは 次に潮が変わっちまう| ８月１５日までの間だけだ。| また: We won't be able to sail until the next tide|change, August 15th... Come back...

3.「これで ハイスコアの目標を| 全部 達成しちまったな！| まったく 驚かせてく: I think you just hit all your high score|goals! You never cease to amaze me!<bw_break>

Now you've hit your total score target! What|a surprise! You took all my prized|possessions, and now I'm all pale! From now|

|season for sailing is over, so be careful...

Guhahahaha! It was a close call, but I'm glad|the voyage is over! All the items you|collected on this voyage were collected and|
|scored according to their value. You will be|rewarded with a high score and a total score|when you reach your goal. High score is the|
|highest score you've earned in a single|voyage. And the total score is the sum of all|the scores you've earned so far...

7.「それじゃ また 航海に参加してくれよ！: Well, then, join me on the voyage again!

9.「……って あんた どうぐかばんが| いっぱいで 持てねえじゃねえか！| バカヤ: ... You can't even carry a bag full of stuff!|You idiot! Go get your stuff together!

10.「おう よく来たな！ あんたにゃ| 前回の航海での 報酬を渡せてなかったはずだ。: Oh, welcome aboard! I didn't give you your|reward for your last voyage... Well, let the|record show...<bw_break>

13.「おっ！ トータルスコアが| <%nB_SCORE>Ｐを 超えてるじゃないか！|: Whoa! Your total score is over <%nB_SCORE>P!|Then take it! The reward for surpassing|<%nB_SCORE>P is <%sB_HOUSYU>!

14.「すまんな。残念だが 今は| 航海に出ることはできねえんだ。| その情熱は 大切: I'm... I'm afraid I can't sail now. I've been|saving that passion...

15.「あんたは パーティを組んでるから| お仲間も 一緒に航海に誘うぜ。| それじゃ: Well, you're in a party, so your friends will|be sailing with you, so... All right, you|ready to go?<yesno><close>

16.「おうっ！| キリキリ働いて ガッポリかせいでくれよ！| それじゃあ 出発の準備: Hey! Work hard and earn a lot of money! Okay,|are you ready to go?<yesno><close>

17.「よしきた！ それじゃあ| あんたに 乗組員の仕事を説明するぜ。|<br>|「幻:
All right, here we go. Now, let me explain to|you what a crewman does. I don't know how it|happened, but things kept falling from the|
|sky. It's all just a bunch of junk and demons|and... The crew's job is to pick up anything|that looks like it might have value. And then|
|I'd give them a score. I'll give you a score,|and you'll be paid accordingly. I'll give you|one practice run before the voyage. I'll be|
|moving onto the ship now, if that's all right|with you.

18.「報酬は ２種類あるぜ！ ハイスコア報酬と| トータルスコア報酬さ。それぞれ目標:
There are two types of rewards! The high|score reward and the total score... If you|exceed each of these goals, you'll be|
|rewarded as you can see!

20.「フレンドか 同じチームに入っている| チームメンバーが 航海に参加していれば|:
If you have a friend or a team member who's|on the same team as you, you can see their|score rankings... But unfortunately, I don't|
|know anyone who's been on a voyage...

21.「幻の海トラシュカでは どういうわけか| 空から ワケのわからねえものが| 次:
In the Sea of Illusion, Trashka, for some|reason, things that I don't understand are|falling from the sky one after another.|
|Things like junk, demons, whatever... The|crew's job is to pick up anything that looks|like it might have value. And then I'd give|
|them a score. I'll give you a score, and|you'll get paid for it. When all the crew is|in the water, the voyage is over. Everything|
|you've collected will be lost by then, so be|careful.

22.「航海には オレが かき集めた| 乗組員８人が 参加するぜ。| なかま同士 せい:
I've recruited a crew of eight to join me on|this voyage. We'll all get along... If you'd|like to go on a voyage with someone you know,|
|we can set up a party here. We'll put you on|the same voyage... If you come with a party|of four, you can choose another party of four|
|and sail with eight other people you know...

23.「幻の海トラシュカで 降ってくるものは| 大きくわけて ふたつだ。|<br>|「:
There are two main types of things that fall|on the Phantom Sea of Trashka. The first is|umbrellas, jewels, and various other items.|
|If you pick one up, you get a score based on|its value. Even if other crew members pick|them up first, they won't disappear, so don't|
|hesitate to pick them up. The second one is a|big-ass bomb rock that explodes as soon as it|falls. If you see one of these, get away from|
|it! If you get caught in the explosion and|fall into the ocean, you'll be helpless for a|while. And even if you don't fall into the|
|water, you're still susceptible to blowing|up, so watch out for the next one.

24.「あんたには ハイスコアと| トータルスコアが 目標に達した時に| 報酬を くれ:
You will be rewarded with a high score and a|total score when you reach the target... High|score is the highest score you've ever earned|
|on a single voyage. And the total score is|the sum of all the scores you've earned so|far. If you want to see what kind of rewards|
|are out there, select "See Rewards."

25.「フレンドや 同じチームのメンバーが| 航海に参加していれば ランキングで| ハ:

|anything for it! It's more like an honor...|Gwahahaha!
